Package io.sf.carte.doc.style.css.nsac

Interface Condition

All Known Subinterfaces:
ArgumentCondition, AttributeCondition, CombinatorCondition, LangCondition, PositionalCondition, PseudoCondition
public interface Condition
Based on SAC's Condition interface by Philippe Le Hegaret.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static short SAC_AND_CONDITION
    This condition checks two conditions in a compound selector.
    static short SAC_ATTRIBUTE_CONDITION
    This condition checks for the presence of an attribute (and eventually its value).
    static short SAC_BEGIN_HYPHEN_ATTRIBUTE_CONDITION
    This condition checks if the value is in a hypen-separated list of values in a specified attribute.
    static short SAC_BEGINS_ATTRIBUTE_CONDITION
    This condition checks the beginning of an attribute value.
    static short SAC_CLASS_CONDITION
    This condition checks for a specified class.
    static short SAC_ENDS_ATTRIBUTE_CONDITION
    This condition checks the end of an attribute value.
    static short SAC_ID_CONDITION
    This condition checks an id attribute.
    static short SAC_LANG_CONDITION
    This condition checks the language of the node.
    static short SAC_ONE_OF_ATTRIBUTE_CONDITION
    This condition checks for a value in a list of space-separated values in an attribute.
    static short SAC_ONLY_CHILD_CONDITION
    This condition checks if a node is the only one in the node list.
    static short SAC_ONLY_TYPE_CONDITION
    This condition checks if a node is the only one of his type.
    static short SAC_POSITIONAL_CONDITION
    This condition checks a specified position.
    static short SAC_PSEUDO_CLASS_CONDITION
    This condition checks for a pseudo class.
    static short SAC_PSEUDO_ELEMENT_CONDITION
    This condition checks for pseudo elements.
    static short SAC_SELECTOR_ARGUMENT_CONDITION
    This condition checks the selector list argument to which a pseudo-class applies.
    static short SAC_SUBSTRING_ATTRIBUTE_CONDITION
    This condition checks a substring of an attribute value.

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    short getConditionType()
    Get the type of Condition.

  • Field Details

    • SAC_AND_CONDITION

      static final short SAC_AND_CONDITION
      This condition checks two conditions in a compound selector. Example: 
         .part1:lang(fr)
      See Also:
      CombinatorCondition, Constant Field Values

    • SAC_POSITIONAL_CONDITION

      static final short SAC_POSITIONAL_CONDITION
      This condition checks a specified position. Example: 
         :first-child
      See Also:
      PositionalCondition, Constant Field Values

    • SAC_ATTRIBUTE_CONDITION

      static final short SAC_ATTRIBUTE_CONDITION
      This condition checks for the presence of an attribute (and eventually its value). Example: 
         [simple]
   [restart="never"]
      See Also:
      AttributeCondition, Constant Field Values

    • SAC_ID_CONDITION

      static final short SAC_ID_CONDITION
      This condition checks an id attribute. Example: 
         #myId
      See Also:
      AttributeCondition, Constant Field Values

    • SAC_LANG_CONDITION

      static final short SAC_LANG_CONDITION
      This condition checks the language of the node. Example: 
         :lang(fr)
      See Also:
      LangCondition, Constant Field Values

    • SAC_ONE_OF_ATTRIBUTE_CONDITION

      static final short SAC_ONE_OF_ATTRIBUTE_CONDITION
      This condition checks for a value in a list of space-separated values in an attribute. Example: 
         [values~="10"]
      See Also:
      AttributeCondition, Constant Field Values

    • SAC_BEGIN_HYPHEN_ATTRIBUTE_CONDITION

      static final short SAC_BEGIN_HYPHEN_ATTRIBUTE_CONDITION
      This condition checks if the value is in a hypen-separated list of values in a specified attribute. Example: 
         [languages|="fr"]
      See Also:
      AttributeCondition, Constant Field Values

    • SAC_CLASS_CONDITION

      static final short SAC_CLASS_CONDITION
      This condition checks for a specified class. Example: 
         .example
      See Also:
      AttributeCondition, Constant Field Values

    • SAC_PSEUDO_CLASS_CONDITION

      static final short SAC_PSEUDO_CLASS_CONDITION
      This condition checks for a pseudo class. Example: 
         :link
   :visited
   :hover
      See Also:
      PseudoCondition, Constant Field Values

    • SAC_ONLY_CHILD_CONDITION

      static final short SAC_ONLY_CHILD_CONDITION
      This condition checks if a node is the only one in the node list.
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

    • SAC_ONLY_TYPE_CONDITION

      static final short SAC_ONLY_TYPE_CONDITION
      This condition checks if a node is the only one of his type.
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

    • SAC_BEGINS_ATTRIBUTE_CONDITION

      static final short SAC_BEGINS_ATTRIBUTE_CONDITION
      This condition checks the beginning of an attribute value. Example: 
         [restart^="never"]
      See Also:
      AttributeCondition, Constant Field Values

    • SAC_ENDS_ATTRIBUTE_CONDITION

      static final short SAC_ENDS_ATTRIBUTE_CONDITION
      This condition checks the end of an attribute value. Example: 
         [restart$="never"]
      See Also:
      AttributeCondition, Constant Field Values

    • SAC_SUBSTRING_ATTRIBUTE_CONDITION

      static final short SAC_SUBSTRING_ATTRIBUTE_CONDITION
      This condition checks a substring of an attribute value. Example: 
         [restart*="never"]
      See Also:
      AttributeCondition, Constant Field Values

    • SAC_SELECTOR_ARGUMENT_CONDITION

      static final short SAC_SELECTOR_ARGUMENT_CONDITION
      This condition checks the selector list argument to which a pseudo-class applies. Example: 
         :not(:visited,:hover)
      See Also:
      ArgumentCondition, Constant Field Values

    • SAC_PSEUDO_ELEMENT_CONDITION

      static final short SAC_PSEUDO_ELEMENT_CONDITION
      This condition checks for pseudo elements. Example: 
         ::first-line
   ::first-letter
      See Also:
      PseudoCondition.getName(), Constant Field Values

      Get the type of Condition.
